titles.title: Employee Educational Assistance Act of 1995
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore and make permanent the exclusion for employer-provided educational assistance.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/30/1995--Introduced. Employee Educational Assistance Act of 1995 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to restore and make permanent the income tax exclusion of amounts paid under employee educational assistance programs.
